topic.title: Asp Clinic Visit Event - conformance rules

section.p: Contains all data specific to each patient encounter. This includes the patient, the providers and students involved the diagnostic and procedure codes, the date and time of the visit, and the CDR cost account. (file 509850.6)

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date of ASP patient's clinic visit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] nbrOfMinutes with data type Integer
The TOTAL number of minutes that were used during this ASP clinic visit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] aspDiagnosisList, where its type is Diagnosis List Entry
Identification of an A&SP condition through a method of consistent analysis.
Contains exactly one [1..1] aspPatient, where its type is Asp Patient
Contains exactly one [1..1] aspProcedureList, where its type is Procedure List Entry
Contains zero or one [0..1] audiologyTest, where its type is Audiometric Test

Contains zero or one [0..1] clinic, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The name of the Clinic for Audiology and Speech Pathology, or Telephone/Rehab and Support. Equivalent to File 44.
Contains exactly one [1..1] clinicStop, where its type is Clinic Stop
Contains exactly one [1..1] primaryPerformer, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] secondaryPerformer, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or one [0..1] verifier, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or one [0..1] aspExamination, where its type is Asp Examination

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date of ASP patient's clinic visit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] nbrOfMinutes with data type Integer
The TOTAL number of minutes that were used during this ASP clinic visit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] aspDiagnosisList, where its type is Diagnosis List Entry
Identification of an A&SP condition through a method of consistent analysis.
Contains exactly one [1..1] aspPatient, where its type is Asp Patient
Contains exactly one [1..1] aspProcedureList, where its type is Procedure List Entry
Contains zero or one [0..1] audiologyTest, where its type is Audiometric Test
Contains exactly one [1..1] clinicStop, where its type is Clinic Stop
Contains exactly one [1..1] primaryPerformer, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] secondaryPerformer, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or one [0..1] verifier, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or one [0..1] aspExamination, where its type is Asp Examination
